summary:
This mod adds a new Thieves Guild Headquarters in Whiterun.

The Thieves Guild never seemed to have branched out beyond Riften. To increase their grasp on Skyrim, a new base of operations has appeared within one of the major holds.
descriptionHtml:
[center][COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=Book Antiqua][SIZE=7]Whiterun Thieves Den[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

This mod adds a new Thieves Guild Headquarters in Whiterun. [/center]

[line]

The Thieves Guild never seemed to have branched out beyond Riften. To increase their grasp on Skyrim, a new base of operations has appeared within one of the major holds.

Requires the latest Skyrim Patch.
No DLC needed.
May conflict with mods that change the area behind the Bannered Mare.

[line]

Location: Behind the Bannered Mare.

For immersion purposes, the entrance will be locked and can only be accessed with a key.

- Olfrid Battle-Born will reward a key after the player has completed the "Imitation Amnesty" quest. The quest is obtained through the completion of 5 Whiterun jobs given through either Delvin or Vex
- If you have already completed this quest, Vekel of the Ragged Flagon will have one behind his counter.
- Click on the entrance and type "Unlock" in the console if you want access right away.

[line]

Features:

- Fence and Apothecary
- Alchemy and Enchanting workbench
- 4 Followers:

Tzu - Ei - Argonian - One-Handed - Capped at 60.
Fjar - Nord - One-Handed - Capped at 65.
Olkran - Nord - Rogue - Capped at 65.
Yjuron - Nord - Ranger - Capped at 60.

Notes on followers:
Followers will have low tier weapons.
Followers are not candidates for marriage.
Followers are not essential and can be killed in combat or by taking falling damage.
Archers will have their own bow with limited arrows.

[line]

My other mods:
